help:
Help Menu 
 -------------------------------------------------------- 
 Available Commands: 

 **!poll** `{question} [option1] [option2]` 

 Example: 
 `!poll {Do you like the polls?} [Yes] [Of course!] [Best polls ever!]` 

 *Note:* Each poll can have **up to 20 options**.
default: Maybe you made a typo? Check all available commands with `*help`.
